name: Mini Robots
description:
As part of the Computer Games Design module in my second year of university, we completed 'Game A Week' for 6 weeks. The second week's theme was the game mechanic of Indirect Control

My game prototype for week 2 is a short platform-puzzle game, which was created in the Unity game engine using C# scripts. The prototype is a 2D, side scroller game, where you interact with the  environment in order to help mini robots navigate the world.

Please Note: This is a mechanic showcase and not a full game
